channel.title: People cant login to my server
channel.description: Hi, i finally got my server working, but now people cant log in to it. I,m using Hamachi so maybe is that the problem? anyway, if someone knows how to let people log in to it please reply ;)

item.title: People cant login to my server
item.dc:creator: @wmashda3000 wmashda3000
item.description:
@wmashda3000 wrote:

it might be something you edited wrongly in the Client.java, either that or you need to portforward the server.
make sure you have been using the right port for the server aswell. Look for the port 43594 in the Server.java. other than that i do not know whats wrong. if it worked before you edited it you might need to start again.

Read full topic
item.source: People cant login to my server

item.title: People cant login to my server
item.dc:creator: @durak durak
item.description:
@durak wrote:

I know my friend typed the ip when it was online but he cant log in. first it loads like 15 secs then it says Eroor connecting to server.

item.title: People cant login to my server
item.dc:creator: @rockh4rd rockh4rd
item.description:
@rockh4rd wrote:

they need to join your hamachi network
and type in the ip of your serverâ€¦
which is on top of your hamachi client
eg. 5.45.65.170
